title: ByuN CALLS herO's BLUFF! (StarCraft 2)
excerpt: Best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and ByuN (Terran). This match was played during the ESL Open Cup Korea 209, a weekly SC2 tournament.
